The School of Mathematics and Statistics at Victoria University of Wellington is seeking to recruit a high achieving students in applied mathematics (or similar) with an interest in pursuing a PhD on a topic related to the mathematical modelling of microfluidic phenomena under the supervision of Dr Brendan Harding. The PhD scholarship includes a generous scholarship ($35k NZD per year for 3 years plus tuition fees). Further information and the application link can be found at
<a href="https://www.wgtn.ac.nz/scholarships/current/phd-scholarship-in-applied-mathematics-on-modelling-microfluidic-phenomena"> https://www.wgtn.ac.nz/scholarships/current/phd-scholarship-in-applied-mathematics-on-modelling-microfluidic-phenomena</a>
